Actions.Name: Add a Contact
Actions.Description: Adds a contact and applies tags

Actions.Name: Delete Contact By External Reference
Actions.Description: Deletes a contact by the external system reference

Actions.Name: Get Contact By External Reference
Actions.Description: Get contact by external system reference

Actions.Name: Inbound SMS Notification
Actions.Description: Raises a notification for an inbound SMS

Actions.Name: Outbound SMS Notification
Actions.Description: Raises a notification for an outbound SMS. Please note to protect you from potentially causing an infinite loop of sending SMS the Outbound SMS trigger is not invoked when sending an SMS from Flow

Actions.Name: Search Contacts
Actions.Description: Search for contacts by name or number

Actions.Name: Send Bulk SMS
Actions.Description: Send SMS by List of Numbers or Tag Names

Actions.Name: Send an SMS
Actions.Description: Sends out a single SMS to an E164 number

Actions.Name: Update Contact By External Reference
Actions.Description: Updates a contact by the external system reference
